data.author: Ed
data.description:
This is the first watchface I have created specifically for the Pebble Time Round
The Big dial on the left shows steps. The top right is a compass, bottom left is battery and bottom right is GMT hour.
Warning: Because of the second hand and the compass, this is a battery hog. I get about 22 hours running it.

latest_release.release_notes: First Release

data.description:
A short time ago in a galaxy near, near away... there was the only one really smartwatch: Pebble.

Galasix is a galaxy style watchface which you can get six data information: time, date, weather temperature, step count, battery charge, step goal progress.

+ Battery constellation, 2 groups of 5 stars.
+ Step goal progress meteor.

CUSTOM YOUR GALASIX GALAXY: color presets or custom colors, show/hide: battery constellation, step goal meteor, background stars.

(Time, Weather, Health)

Designed and developed by dP-watchfaces
Check out http://dp-watchfaces.com/

---

www.kzl.io/cwp

(24h Trial)

data.author: Simply

changelog.release_notes:
- Added Bluetooth icon & Quiet Time icon
- Added Black / White theme for monochrome displays
- Hourly Vibration has been changed to Periodic Vibration ( Off, 15 minutes, 30 minutes, 1 hour, 2 hours ) 
- Periodic Vibration is automatically disabled while Quiet Time is active ( no more unwanted vibrations while sleeping ) 
- Quiet Time will show an icon if itâs active - Added 9 new languages: Czech, Slovak, Catalan, Turkish, Portuguese, Polish, Hungarian, Swedish, & Norwegian 
- Made changes to the settings page and KiezelPay display message
-Fixed text overflow on sharp font for monochrome displays
-Added LECO font option for monochrome displays
- Added progress bar auto-color to monochrome displays

- Progress auto-color (based on battery)
- Minor text updates
- Displays battery if health is disabled

v1.0

data.description:
SleekBlock is a clear, sleek watchface. It has the following features:
1. Displays the digital time clearly
2. Has a battery bar at the top that indicates the battery life
3. With a flick of the wrist, the time will change to display the date and month
4. Will vibrate when Pebble is disconnected from Bluetooth.

It utilises whitespace in the design, which is the key feature for creating a sleek look. It has no animations, which will help prolong the already amazing battery life of the Pebble.

latest_release.release_notes:
v1.0
- First release for Pebble, Pebble Steel, Pebble Time and Pebble Time Steel

data.title: SleekBlock

data.author: zszen
data.description:
Upgrade From My Watchface "ZWatch". Now This Watchface Have Contain Health Step And Sleep. 
The Blue Wave Display Your Yesterday Sleep In Average. The Orange One Display You Today Sport Value. Full Is 75%(If 100%, It Maybe Over 100%, So I Leave 25% Space).

1.the two numbers is a hour in day : 17
2.first number position is now hour in day (17/24 = position)
3.second number position is now minutes in one hour (30~40 maybe)
4.left blue color display yesterday you sleep in average (0~125%)
5.right orange color display today sport motion in avarage(0~125%)
6.each 5 minute change position.(save power)
7.each motion update the wave position.(1 frame update only for safe power)
8.only back to the watchface contain a animation with numbers position and color waves. (save power)

pic2: 17:30~17:35
pic3: 18:20~18:30

latest_release.release_notes: pebble 2 support

data.title: ZWaveTime

changelog.release_notes:

2. added a switch to disable showing watchface grid line;

2. every widget can be set transparent background;

1. fix some bugs about today steps (3x1) widget;
2. week (3x1) widget support English, Chinese and Spanish;

2. widget detail optimization.
added 2 widgets, week number and new year image.

data.author: chops
data.description:
Just another analog face, with a bit of my style.

Configurable elements are,
 - pebble logo
 - digital time
 - steps
 - day
 - date
 - seconds
 - bluetoothvibe
 - hourlyvibe
 - background tic marks - normal or lots of hours!

The small circle at the bottom represents the battery level.  The bluetooth indicator is within this circle. Quiet time is indicated by a small grey mouse appearing in the center of the watchface.

data.description:
Digital display where the hour color reflects the battery level. 
Green when above 50%. 
Below 50%, gradually changes from blue to purple to red.
Red 10% and below. 
Yellow when charging.
Line appears under time when bluetooth connection lost.
Date and daily step count displayed.

data.author: Numerist

changelog.release_notes: A free API key must be obtained from Weather Underground, to enter in the configuration settings.
Corrected a few terms in settings and two UV calculations, added one measurement format to barometric pressure
Vastly expanded version of the original dozenal watchface

data.description: Dozenal time, calendar, and weather measures, all in several formats choosable by the user. Time presents diurnal, semidiurnal, and other formats. The calendar comes in 6 formats (including 3 traditional). The weather gives temperature, barometric pressure, UV index, relative humidity, wind speed, and wind direction, each in Primel, TGM, and traditional metrologies. Explanation: http://dozenal.ae-web.ca/pdf/watch.pdf. ***NOTE: to run the weather functions, you need to get a free API key from Weather Underground to enter in the configuration settings.

latest_release.release_notes: A free API key must be obtained from Weather Underground, to enter in the configuration settings.

data.title: Dozenal weather clock

data.author: PNL Design
data.description:
Discrete time telling through tickles on your arm. Cool if you need the time when in a meeting. With battery status and BT connection indicator hidden in the 9-marker (turns red on lost BT). With a flick of the wrist the watch tells you the time with a vibration pattern : 

First a series of long vibes per hour 
Next a series of double vibes per quarter 
And last a series of short vibes per minute 

The tickle function can be disabled. Convenient night mode option for low light operation. Extremely battery friendly. $1.99 with a free 1 day trial.

latest_release.release_notes: Corrected 12-marker

data.title: Tickle Time

data.author: Gianluca Troiani
data.description:
5x5 text grid watchface.
You can set function for each line from:

- Time (12:34)
- Day date (SUN01)
- Month date (DEC01)
- Month (DECEM)
- Year (Y2016)
- Battery
- Steps

You can set font and colors for time row (accent color) and for the other rows.

Optionally you can have no BT connection on 5th row.
data.title: 25 o'clock

data.author: Dr. Antonio Aguilera.
data.description:
El Sol (The Sun)
Por: Dr. Antonio Aguilera

This is my fourth watchface using my unique "Dual Custom Update-Rate System" (D.C.U.R.S.), thus, you can save a lot of battery power using it. (Please read the description of my other watchfaces "Dual-ManÃ­a", "LÃ­neas Gordas" and "Rolling Balls Clock" to learn about D.C.U.R.S.)

"El Sol" is an experimental watch face trying to emulate the sun's movement as seen from Earth. From its initial stages, it was pretty accurate for any location within the Mexican Country, which is quite large. 

However, as latitude increases, the associate formulae may become VERY complex, specially passing the Tropic of Cancer (& Capricorn), where the sun can no longer be directly overhead (at the Zenith), and not to mention passing the the Arctic and Antarctic Polar Circles, where a day can last up to six months! (have you ever heard about "midnight sun", or the opposite, "polar nights"?). Things get worse if we also consider that the starting and ending dates of "daylight saving time" are "politically set" by each country. You want GeoPolitical (not Geographic) time.

These were the main reasons I had not released this watchface earlier. But now that our Pebble is dying, I decided that the user might set the "Sun Path Amplitude" value according to his Latitude location, and set the the "Sun Path Vertical Offset" according to the year season. This lets this watchface be fairly accurate all over the planet and lets me release it before the Pebble Store is shut down (so YOU can have it!).

El Sol, it is FREE, so please ENJOY it, and HEART â¤ it!

latest_release.release_notes: Initial release.

data.title: El Sol

-ORA ANCHE LE IMPOSTAZIONI SONO IN ITALIANO!

Se apprezzate il mio lavoro, lasciate un cuore qui sopra. Per segnalare un errore di traduzione, contattatemi.

data.description:
Go retro with my watchface!
Iconic operation system Windows 98 on your Pebble!

Icons on taskbar represent bluetooth connection and quiet time.
Recycle bin will change to full when battery level drops below set value (bin states can be switched in settings).
Desktop color and text can be changed as well a date format (US/EU).

Also, you can enable window containing date and time! When enabled, you can manage its position in settings and what is more - on taskbar you'll get battery level in percentage.

Now there's an option to show data/time window with a flick! You can set the time how long the window will be shown.

There is monochrome theme to choose as well!

Feel free to contact me if you have any suggestions or want report a bug. :)

latest_release.release_notes:
v1.6:
- bug fix

data.title: Windows 98

data.author: Hanna Diggins (Industrial Illusions)
data.description:
Choose what type of look you want. Currently offered themes are:
- GameBoy Classic, NES, SNES, GameCube, Wii, Switch
- Famicom
- Xbox Black, Xbox White
- Playstation

Top right corner is battery, middle top is step count, and top left is bluetooth connection. Different date, bluetooth, and disconnect vibrate configurations are available.

Please contact me with suggestions or bugs!

BUGS:
- If you go to a different screen on the watch, the theme will go back to classic. Currently working to fix the problem.

latest_release.release_notes: More themes!

data.title: PocketBoy

data.description:
Rolling Balls Clock
An amazing mechanical marvel.

This is my third watchface using my unique "Dual Custom Update-Rate System" (D.C.U.R.S.), thus, you can save a lot of battery power using it. (Please read the description of my other watchfaces "Dual-ManÃ­a" and "LÃ­neas Gordas" to learn about D.C.U.R.S.)

You might be wondering how can a fully animated watchface claims not to use too much battery power. Well, it actually uses from very little power to too much, depending on the settings. First explore all the options in the configuration page and pay attention to those marked with an (*). These affect the battery consumption.

Animation is obtained by a sequence of frames. The more frames per time unit, the smoother animation, at a cost of more battery power. There is an option to show the number of frames per minute (fpm). So, use it, and try to keep the best possible balance.

Hints:
1. "Stop Motion Anim." is a VERY battery-friendly technique and see that your eyes and brain fill in the gaps.
2. Do not set the update rate to 1 sec or 2. Set it to 5 or 10 and you will still have seconds. Or better yet, to 1 or 5 min and watch the fpm reduce. Also set it at night to 10 or 15 min, or more. Let your Pebble sleep when you sleep!.
3. The "tap" function lets you awake your Pebble from a long sleep and update its display during the specified time. If set to zero, nothing happens if the pebble is tapped.
4. Email me if you have ANY question.

This is my Christmas gift, with all my heart, to YOU  --yes, the person reading these lines right now. So, please ENJOY it, and HEART â¤ it!

latest_release.release_notes:
- No animation during NIGHT (you are sleeping!, aren't you?) 
- Better animation routines.
- Â¡Â¡Â¡ Soporte para EspaÃ±ol !!!

data.title: Rolling Balls Clock

data.description:
This watchface displays the current fields (from top to bottom) :

- step count.  When the step count falls below (above) 25 % of the daily average, the health icon turns red (yellow).
- battery.  When charging, the battery icon turns green.  When below 30%, it turns red.
- on the same line of the battery readings, a bluetooth connection indicator is present.  It is only lit when the communication is lost.
- time
- date

All colors of the information indicators can be changed. 

Credit goes to the dev of Crystal Fit, on which the design has been based.

latest_release.release_notes:
- Add multilanguage support
- Add multifont support
- Increase font sizes
- Better icon quality
- Add variable deviation from average step count

This was the last face I was working on.  It was requested by reddit user /u/SterlingEly that I never finished.

data.description:
Multi function watch-face that shows a temperature and chance of precipitation graph of the next 20 hours, wind speed, current weather conditions and of course, the date and time.  Currently supports getting weather data from Dark Sky and Weather Underground. 

Also it has MasterKey integration so you don't have to manually enter your API keys in, just log in with your MasterKey account and it will grab your Weather Underground API key for you.

changelog.release_notes:
V1.1 
After 6000 steps in green, now goes round again in magenta (6000 - 12000 steps)

data.description: This is a simple analog watchface that displays the date in a large font and the number of steps as a circle (a full circle = 6000 steps). The first 6000 steps are shown in green (image 1 = 4000 steps), then it goes round again in magenta (image 2 = 7600 steps). It's intended for easy visibility of key items (time, date, steps), and hopefully a classy appearance.

V1.1

data.author: Tor Harrington
data.description:
This was a request from twitter user @pebbleaday. It is the french version of a poppy called Bleuet de France.

Please, if you like and install this watchface, I highly encourage you to donate and support the official charity in france. http://www.bleuetdefrance.fr/ where the original design originates but modified for the watch.

The inner flower - dark blue - is the hour hand.
The outer flower - light blue - is the minute hand.

the pointy triangle bit is the actual hand and points to the time.

data.description:
Hello there, trainer!

Your Pebble is inhabited by creatures called Pokemon...

Every day, youâll receive an egg. Walk around for a bit, and the egg will hatch into a random Pokemon!

Some Pokemon will grow and evolve as you walk around throughout the day, so keep active!

Once you fill up the step gauge on the left, youâll earn a badge. Collect all 8 badges to get the chance to hatch a legendary Pokemon!

Also, make sure you customize your watchface by checking the Pokesteps Settings in your Pebble Watchfaces screen.

Now what are you waiting for? Start stepping!


-----

Step goal is currently set to your typical step count for the particular day of the week, with the egg hatching once youâve reached 10% of the goal. 
Pokemon are randomly chosen among the first 386 (Generations I, II, and III) in the national PokeDex. Alolan variants not currently included.

latest_release.release_notes: - Fixed blank city background/Pokemon when zoom level is 3

data.title: PokeSteps

data.author: chops
data.description:
I've been working on this one for a while, so have finished it off. After a number of design iterations, i'm done. It's similar to another of my watchfaces (Themes), but, here there's no weather, no health. Just the time, date, battery and BT.

BT status is represented by the small white lines top right (below the battery number) - or on the PTR a small black/white 'bump' bottom middle.  When BT is lost the lines are dotted, or the bump turns white.

The date/day/month appears briefly with a flick of the wrist, then disappears again.

It's just about the background pictures - there's 20 to choose from. Each here has been hand picked, touched up and optimised for the pebble time, time round, P2/OG.  There's also a 'random' mode which can update either each minute or each hour.

All images are part of the watchface PBW file (it requires no uploading or separate app), and as such, it takes a bit longer to load - please wait about 30secs or so (if for some reason it fails during loading, just try again). Given the simplicity, it also keeps working when your phone is dead.

ps, if you look through the images carefully, there's a cryptic reference to another product pebblers would be aware of..
data.title: Wallpaper

data.author: Nev Rawlins
data.description:
A simple Analog watch face created using RockyJS.  

Heiko Behrens used this in his presentation at JSConf Iceland 2016 (you can watch this on YouTube).  He described it as ânot the most obvious watchfaceâ - I like that!

The large arc is the hour and small arc the minute.  The centre circle indicates AM (grey) or PM (green).

I had been waiting for a defect fix from Pebble for the small minute arcs when at the top of the screen (appears upside down), but the recent news means that wonât be coming, so this âfeatureâ will remain - kind of fun, really.

Screenshots:  10:10PM,  7:00AM,  12:15PM


Design & Programming Copyright Â© 2016 Nev Rawlins
data.title: AnalogArcs

changelog.release_notes: TIME added as an extra information after shake
This project was designed in march. I have been waiting 9 months to release it.

data.description:
This is a paid watchface. $0.99 + local taxes. You have 24h trial. Payment is handled through KiezelPay www.kzl.io/momenttmm 

MOMENTTMM
A new way to see time passing by. Unforeseen changes in infinite combinations pointing to something unique which lasts only for a moment like luck or love. Time and seconds with or without unique moment. Plus: date, week number, temperature, steps, activity time, GMT after shake. Right hand setup. When you set all four lines after shake you will see  whole data picture. Weather using Pebble Master Key. Battery status on/off, hourly vibration, BT disconnect alert and status. Color presets and color customization. Sunset mode. Date language localization: English, FranÃ§ais, Deutsch, EspaÃ±ol, Italiano, Polski. TTMM collection won Silver and Gold A Design Award in Interface and Interaction Design Category. Design: Albert Salamon. Programming: Gregoire Sage. Copyrights Â© Albert Salamon 2016

latest_release.release_notes: TIME added as an extra information after shake

data.title: MOMENTTMM

data.author: Bruno LourenÃ§o
data.description:
Why the analog watches have two hands?
Why show only 12h if we have 24h each day?
Why should we care about all the other numbers if we only want to see the current hour and minute?
Well, a digital watch shows us that e.g. (20:45). But the digital watches lacks visual data.
So I decided to join the best of the two worlds by creating this watch, with visual and digital data.

latest_release.release_notes: First release

data.author: David Morgan

changelog.release_notes:
All platforms
========
- Adjust font so 5 doesn't look so similar to 6
- General bugfixes

Pebble Time & Pebble 2
==============
- Setting to handle Timeline Quick Views. Toggle it on and the entire watchface shifts up during a Timeline Quick View.

All platforms
========
- Seconds setting. Show seconds on clock.
- Profiles!

Time, Time Round, Pebble 2
=================
- Geocoding. Now you can specify your location for weather updates.
- Master Key support. Get your Master Key at https://www.pmkey.xyz and say goodbye to entering long weather API keys.

Pebble OG
=======
No changes. Sorry. :-(

Pebble Time | Pebble Time Round | Pebble 2
==========================-
- Location layer: Now see where you are!
- Prefix/suffix for widget: Add custom text before and after each widget.
- Widget boxes: Widgets can now have a box. Size, color, and border are all customizable.

* Fixed a color bug relating to weather update time on Pebble 2.
* Added heart rate to Pebble 2. I am unable to test this so if you experience any issues, let me know.
Weather components on Pebble Time, Pebble Time Round, and Pebble 2.

data.description:
Every wanted to customize a watchface in real time? Now you can!

Every element can be stretched, rotated, moved, and recolored. Changes are sent to the watch instantly so you can customize in real time.

Complications:
- Time
- Date
- Bluetooth
- Battery
- Steps (disabled by default)
